RemediationStrings.Title: Cisco AnyConnect VPN must be installed
RemediationStrings.Description: Cisco AnyConnect VPN is not installed

RemediationStrings.Title: Cisco AnyConnect VPN version must be 5.1.2.42 or higher. Value discovered was: {ActualValue}.
RemediationStrings.Description: Cisco AnyConnect VPN version must be 5.1.2.42 or higher. Please contact your Administrator

RemediationStrings.Title: The Cisco AnyConnect VPN service must be installed
RemediationStrings.Description: Cisco AnyConnect VPN is not installed or service has failed to install

RemediationStrings.Title: The Cisco AnyConnect VPN must be running. Current service state is: {ActualValue}.
RemediationStrings.Description: The Cisco AnyConnect VPN is not in the running state
